A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm not 100% sure what movie everyone else saw\, but this was terrible! And I love Star Wars! And I liked Godzilla with Matthew Broderick\, so you know I'm not picky! They totally phoned in the story\, characters & script & made it all about the action. And don't get me wrong. The Force Awakens was great\, so I thought this one would be stellar\, but it was disjointed\, clunky & an after thought. The acting was superb\, but I can't go above 1 Star because the franchise deserves better.
